name: Rabbit: Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Rabbit: Jigsaw Puzzles. It‘s a clever and colorful learning experience. Puzzles are a challenging young minds, teaching and preparing them early in life some very important life skills.

FEATURES:

- Perfect for all ages
- Rotation mode for greater challenge.
- Many bright Watercolour puzzle images.
- Colorful puzzling atmosphere.
- Traditional puzzle gameplay.
- Simple controls make it easy to solve picture!
